title: SaaS Pricing Toolkit - High-Intent Calculators
description: A lightweight set of SaaS pricing and cloud cost tools designed for SEO and tier-1 traffic.

title: About | PricingNest
description: What PricingNest is, how the calculators work, and what assumptions to use for SaaS pricing and cloud unit economics.

title: Contact | SaaS Pricing Toolkit
description: Contact information and feedback details for this website.

title: Cookie Policy | SaaS Pricing Toolkit
description: Cookie policy and consent preferences for this website.

title: Glossary | PricingNest
description: Short definitions for the key SaaS pricing and unit economics terms used in the toolkit.

title: A/B Test | PricingNest
description: Experiment comparing two variants; used for pricing pages and packaging.

title: Activation | PricingNest
description: The moment a user experiences core value; the hinge point between signup and habit.

title: ACV (Annual Contract Value) | PricingNest
description: Annualized contract value; often used for sales performance and enterprise pricing.

title: Add-on | PricingNest
description: Optional feature or capacity sold separately, often used for expansion revenue.

title: Annual Plan | PricingNest
description: A plan billed yearly; often includes discounts and changes cash timing.

title: Annual Prepay Discount | PricingNest
description: Discount for annual commitment; trades revenue for cash flow and retention.

title: API Call | PricingNest
description: A request to an API endpoint; can be priced per call or per 1,000 calls.

title: Revenue per Seat | PricingNest
description: Average recurring revenue per seat and how it changes under pricing models.

title: ARPA / ARPU | PricingNest
description: Average revenue per account (or user) used in LTV and payback models.

title: ARPU | PricingNest
description: Average revenue per user; used more in consumer apps than B2B accounts.

title: ARR | PricingNest
description: Annual recurring revenue; MRR x 12 run-rate for subscriptions.

title: ARRR Funnel | PricingNest
description: Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Revenue, Referral; a lifecycle view for growth and pricing.

title: Backups | PricingNest
description: Data copies for recovery; often adds storage overhead and retrieval costs.

title: Bandwidth | PricingNest
description: Data transferred per time, typically priced per GB with tiered rates.

title: Bill Shock | PricingNest
description: Unexpectedly high invoices in usage pricing; reduces retention and trust.

title: Billing Cycle | PricingNest
description: How often you invoice (monthly, annual); affects churn measurement and cash flow.

title: Blended Cost | PricingNest
description: Weighted average unit cost across regions, tiers, and discounts.

title: Bookings | PricingNest
description: Contracted revenue (often annual) that may differ from recognized revenue and ARR.

title: Break-even Churn | PricingNest
description: Churn rate where a price increase produces no net revenue gain.

title: Burst Traffic | PricingNest
description: Spiky usage patterns; increases risk in usage-based pricing and capacity planning.

title: CAC Payback Period | PricingNest
description: How many months of gross profit it takes to recover CAC.

title: CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) | PricingNest
description: Cost to acquire a customer; use with gross profit to estimate payback.

title: CDN | PricingNest
description: Content Delivery Network; reduces origin load but can introduce request fees.

title: Churn Cohort | PricingNest
description: Churn measured by cohort to avoid misleading period-over-period comparisons.

title: Churn Mitigation | PricingNest
description: Tactics to reduce churn, from onboarding and guardrails to pricing and packaging.

title: Churn (Customer & Revenue) | PricingNest
description: Loss of customers or recurring revenue over time (logo vs revenue churn).

title: COGS (Cost of Goods Sold) | PricingNest
description: Direct costs to deliver your product (infra + vendor costs for SaaS).

title: Cohort Retention | PricingNest
description: Retention measured by customer cohorts over time; helps interpret churn correctly.

title: Cohort | PricingNest
description: Group of customers sharing a start date or trait; used to measure retention and churn.

title: Contract Value | PricingNest
description: Value of a contract over its term; commonly expressed as TCV or ACV.

title: Contribution Margin | PricingNest
description: Margin after variable costs (often gross profit minus variable S&M/support).

title: Cross-sell | PricingNest
description: Selling a different product or add-on to an existing customer; can improve ARPA.

title: Discount | PricingNest
description: Reducing price to drive conversion or commitment; must be modeled for margin impact.

title: Downgrade | PricingNest
description: Reduction in recurring revenue from a customer due to lower plan or usage.

title: Effective Monthly Rate | PricingNest
description: Annual price normalized to a monthly equivalent for comparison.

title: Egress | PricingNest
description: Outbound data transfer; often a significant variable cost for infra products.

title: Expansion Revenue | PricingNest
description: Revenue gained from existing customers via upsells, usage growth, or add-ons.

title: Fair Use | PricingNest
description: Reasonable usage expectation for plans; prevents abuse and cost spikes.

title: Feature Gating | PricingNest
description: Restricting features by plan; shifts value capture beyond pure usage.

title: Fixed Cost | PricingNest
description: Costs that do not scale with usage; should be recovered via base fees.

title: GB-Month | PricingNest
description: Storage measured as average GB stored over a month (GB times time).

title: Grace Period | PricingNest
description: Time window before enforcing limits after payment failure or overage; impacts churn and support.

title: Grandfathering | PricingNest
description: Keeping existing customers on old pricing to reduce churn risk during increases.

title: Gross Margin | PricingNest
description: The percent of revenue left after COGS; a core constraint for pricing.

title: GRR (Gross Revenue Retention) | PricingNest
description: Revenue retention excluding expansions; isolates churn and downgrades.

title: Included Usage | PricingNest
description: Usage bundled into a plan or platform fee before overages apply.

title: Logo Churn | PricingNest
description: Percent of customers who cancel in a period (customer churn).

title: LTV:CAC | PricingNest
description: Ratio of lifetime gross profit to CAC; a common unit economics health check.

title: LTV (Customer Lifetime Value) | PricingNest
description: Expected gross profit over a customer

title: Marginal Cost | PricingNest
description: Incremental cost to serve one more unit or customer; key for usage pricing.

title: Minimum Commitment | PricingNest
description: A minimum monthly or annual spend requirement, often paired with usage pricing.

title: MRR | PricingNest
description: Monthly recurring revenue; normalized subscription revenue per month.

title: Net New MRR | PricingNest
description: New + expansion MRR minus churn and contraction; core growth metric.

title: NRR (Net Revenue Retention) | PricingNest
description: Revenue retention including expansions; key for growth and pricing impact.

title: On-call | PricingNest
description: Operational coverage for incidents; a key driver of support cost and SLA pricing.

title: Origin Fetch | PricingNest
description: Traffic from CDN to origin; can affect egress and cost structure.

title: Overage | PricingNest
description: Charges applied when a customer exceeds included usage or plan limits.

title: P50 (Median) Usage | PricingNest
description: Typical usage level; useful for designing included usage, tiers, and limits.

title: P90 Usage | PricingNest
description: Heavy usage level; use to protect gross margin and avoid subsidizing power users.

title: Packaging | PricingNest
description: How you bundle features and limits into plans; shapes value perception and conversion.

title: Payback Period | PricingNest
description: Time required to recover CAC from gross profit; key unit economics metric.

title: Per Active User | PricingNest
description: Charging based on active users instead of total seats; aligns price with usage intensity.

title: Per Seat | PricingNest
description: Charging per user seat; simple to explain but can misalign with cost for automation-heavy customers.

title: Platform Fee | PricingNest
description: A base fee charged regardless of usage; recovers fixed costs.

title: Price Increase | PricingNest
description: Raising prices; evaluate break-even churn and rollout strategy.

title: Pricing Metric | PricingNest
description: The unit you charge on; should be buyer-friendly and align with value/cost.

title: Pricing Page | PricingNest
description: Your plan and unit definitions; must be clear to avoid sales/support friction.

title: Ramp | PricingNest
description: How quickly customers grow into paid usage after signing up; affects payback and tier design.

title: Rate Card | PricingNest
description: A list of unit prices for usage, add-ons, and services; useful for enterprise quoting.

title: Rate Limit | PricingNest
description: Limits on requests per time window; can protect cost and plan fairness.

title: Renewal | PricingNest
description: A customer continuing their subscription at the end of a billing term.

title: Replication | PricingNest
description: Storing multiple copies for durability/availability; increases GB-month cost.

title: Request Pricing | PricingNest
description: Pricing based on API or storage requests; requires clear unit definitions.

title: Request | PricingNest
description: A single operation sent to a service (API request, storage request, etc.).

title: Retention Curve | PricingNest
description: Retention plotted over time; highlights early churn vs long-term stickiness.

title: Retrieval Fees | PricingNest
description: Fees to read data back from cold storage; important for archival products.

title: Revenue Churn | PricingNest
description: Percent of recurring revenue lost in a period (gross or net).

title: Revenue Recognition | PricingNest
description: Accounting treatment of revenue over time; differs from cash collected.

title: Run Rate | PricingNest
description: A normalized revenue pace (e.g., MRR) used to project annualized performance.

title: Seat-Based Pricing | PricingNest
description: Charging by number of users; simple but can break when costs scale with usage.

title: Storage Costs | PricingNest
description: Costs to store data plus requests, replication, backups, and overhead.

title: Support Costs | PricingNest
description: Support effort that may scale with accounts or usage; influences COGS decisions.

title: TCV (Total Contract Value) | PricingNest
description: Total value over the full contract term (including multi-year commitments).

title: Throttling | PricingNest
description: Delaying or rejecting requests when usage exceeds limits; impacts user experience.

title: Tiers | PricingNest
description: Pricing levels with different limits or features; used to segment customers.

title: Time to Value | PricingNest
description: How quickly a customer reaches value; affects churn risk and pricing tolerance.

title: Token Pricing | PricingNest
description: Pricing based on tokens (common for LLM/AI usage); requires careful unit definitions.

title: Unit Cost | PricingNest
description: Cost per unit of usage (call, event, GB, minute) used to set margin-safe prices.

title: Unit Economics | PricingNest
description: Profitability per customer or unit; core input for pricing decisions.

title: Scenario Modeling | PricingNest
description: Best/base/worst cases (p50 vs p90) used to stress-test pricing.

title: Upsell | PricingNest
description: Selling a higher plan or add-on to an existing customer; contributes to expansion revenue.

title: Usage-Based Pricing | PricingNest
description: Charging based on consumption (calls, events, GB, minutes) instead of seats alone.

title: Usage Cap | PricingNest
description: A maximum usage limit; prevents extreme bills and protects margins.

title: Usage Forecast | PricingNest
description: Projected customer usage over time; used to design tiers and commitments.

title: Value Metric | PricingNest
description: The metric that best correlates with value delivered (seat, call, GB, etc.).

title: Variable Cost | PricingNest
description: Cost that scales with usage (calls, GB, minutes); drives unit economics and margin.

title: Guides | PricingNest
description: Practical guides for SaaS pricing decisions, unit economics, and cloud cost recovery.

description: Link activation events to pricing prompts and upgrades.

description: Estimate a monthly API plan price from calls, infra cost per 1k calls, fixed overhead, and a target gross margin.

title: ARR Calculator | PricingNest
description: Convert MRR to ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue) and use it as a run-rate metric for SaaS growth reporting.

title: Bandwidth Cost Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate egress/bandwidth cost and a recommended price using your own per-GB costs, fixed overhead, and target gross margin.

title: Break-Even CAC Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate the maximum CAC you can afford given ARPA, gross margin, churn, and a target payback period.

title: CAC Payback Period Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate how many months it takes to recover CAC using ARPA and gross margin.

title: Churn Impact Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate churned revenue over a month and a year from your MRR and monthly churn rate.

title: Cohort Retention Curve Calculator | PricingNest
description: Model a 6-month retention curve from a cohort size and a constant monthly retention rate.

title: Compute Cost Estimator | PricingNest
description: Estimate monthly compute cost from vCPU-hours and GB-hours, then back into a recommended price at your target gross margin.

title: LTV Calculator (SaaS) | PricingNest
description: Estimate customer LTV from ARPA, gross margin, and monthly churn rate.

title: Monthly Cloud Cost Estimator | PricingNest
description: Add up monthly compute, storage, bandwidth, and other costs into a single monthly cloud cost estimate (input-driven).

title: MRR Calculator | PricingNest
description: Calculate ending MRR from new, expansion, contraction, and churned MRR.

title: Net Revenue Retention (NRR) Calculator | PricingNest
description: Calculate net revenue retention from starting MRR plus expansion, contraction, and churn.

title: Price per GB-Month Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate a margin-safe price per GB-month using storage cost per GB-month, fixed overhead, average stored GB, and a target gross margin.

title: Pricing Increase Impact Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate the impact of a price increase on monthly revenue, including an assumption for customer churn from the increase.

title: Pricing Tier Optimizer | PricingNest
description: Back into tier prices from a target ARPA and your expected plan mix.

title: Seat vs Usage Pricing Comparison | PricingNest
description: Compare a seat-based plan against usage-based pricing for the same workload, including a clear cost difference.

title: Storage Cost Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate storage cost from average GB stored, request volume, and per-unit costs, then compute a price at your target margin.

title: Tiered Usage Pricing Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate a monthly bill for a platform fee + included usage + tiered overages (up to 3 tiers), plus effective rates.

title: Usage-Based Pricing Calculator | PricingNest
description: Estimate a per-unit price from unit costs, fixed overhead, and a target gross margin. Generates revenue and gross profit estimates.

title: SaaS Pricing Use Cases | PricingNest
description: Practical flows for SaaS pricing decisions: usage-based pricing, API pricing, infra cost recovery, unit economics, and pricing experiments.

title: API Pricing for SaaS - Use Case | SaaS Pricing Toolkit
description: A simple flow for pricing an API product: estimate costs, back into target margin, and compare seat vs usage.

title: Infra Cost Recovery - Use Case | SaaS Pricing Toolkit
description: A simple flow for pricing infra-heavy features: bandwidth + storage cost estimation, then pricing at target margin.

title: Pricing Experiments - Use Case | PricingNest
description: A practical flow for pricing experiments: model price increase impact, estimate break-even churn, and compare annual discount tradeoffs.

title: SaaS Unit Economics - Use Case | PricingNest
description: A practical flow for SaaS unit economics: connect churn, LTV, CAC payback, break-even CAC, and ARR run rate.

title: Usage-Based Pricing - Use Case | PricingNest
description: A practical flow for usage-based pricing: estimate unit price from costs and margin, then validate against seat-based alternatives.

title: Terms of Use | SaaS Pricing Toolkit
description: Terms of use and disclaimer for calculator outputs.
